title: Is there any research on AI happening in India? - Quora

response.answer_text: Of Course, India is playing a good role in technology and so the research and development in this field also going on. Every country in the world is working on this technology. a government think-tank, National Institution for Transforming India (NITI) Aayog (Hindi for Policy Commission), will spearhead a National Program focusing on AI research. This development comes on the heels of the launch of a Task Force on Artificial Intelligence for India’s Economic Transformation by the Commerce and Industry Department of the Government of India in 2017. You can go and check on the NITI Aayog website for the future plan of India. Hope you like the answer. Follow and upvote.
